Automatically open a cart right after you create it.

To import a shared cart, paste the generated link in the field above.
The shared cart will automatically appear in your list once imported.

How to share a cart:
1. Open your cart.
2. Tap the 'Share' button.
3. Copy the generated link and send it to someone.

How to import a shared cart:
1. Copy the shared link you received.
2. Paste it into the input field above.
3. Tap 'Import' and check your cart list for the new entry.

We\'re committed to creating a personalized shopping experience for everyone. To make it easier for you to keep track of your selections and enhance your shopping journey, consider giving your cart a name before adding items.
Deleting this cart will permanently remove all items from \"%s\" and cannot be undone.

It appears your shopping cart is currently empty. To begin adding items, you can easily navigate to your desired product categories and select them. Once you\'ve found something you\'d like, simply tap on the shopping cart icon, conveniently located in the upper left corner, to add it to your cart.

This currency selection will be utilized across the platform for displaying product prices, processing transactions, and providing a more personalized shopping experience
Automatically open a cart immediately after it is created.
Cart Calculator is a simple, generic and free shopping cart manager and total due calculator that replaces the ordinary device\â€™s calculator for when you are at the grocery store or at the market.

Cart Calculator allows you to manage your shopping cart by adding products and increasing or decreasing their quantities. At any time, the Cart Calculator displays the total due of the products in your cart based on their prices and quantities.
Why should I use Cart Calculator?
Cart Calculator helps you to always be aware of how much youâ€™re spending even before reaching the checkout. This is especially useful for when you have to go shopping on a budget.
Can I use Cart Calculator outside of grocery stores or markets?
Yes! Since Cart Calculator is shockingly simple and generic, you can also use it in pubs, restaurants, the movies etc.
How do I add an item to my cart using Cart Calculator?
Open your cart and press the \"Add item\" button in the Action Bar to add a new product to your cart. You inform its name, price and quantity and then click on the \"Add\" button.
How do I increase or decrease the quantity of an item in my cart using Cart Calculator?
Simply find the item in the list and then press the \"+ (plus)\" button to increase its quantity or the \"- (less)\" button to decrease its quantity.
How do I remove an item from my cart using Cart Calculator?
To remove a product from your cart, simply swipe right or left or drop its quantity to zero and then select the \"Delete item\" button.
Yes! Cart Calculator is proudly free software distributed under the GNU General Public License version 3.
How can I contribute to Cart Calculator?

The best way to contribute to Cart Calculator is through its GitHub repository. From there, you can fork it and work on your contributions, and later send them back via pull request. You can also use the issue tracker to report bugs, propose new features or enhancements, or get ideas for how you could help.
